quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.  – Bruce Lee
fact: Telly Savalas and Louis Armstrong died on their birthdays.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Why is it a bad idea to iron your four-leaf clover? Cause you shouldn't press your luck.
